mapper.select:
select
distinct
F_GetTableText('T_DM_XB', 'code', 'name', GENDER) gender, F_GetTableText('T_DM_HZLX', 'code', 'name', HZLX) hzlx, F_GetTableText('T_DM_HZZT', 'code', 'name', STATUS) status , hzid, hzhm, gh, xm, gj, birthday, csdd, qfrq, qfdd, yxqz, fzjg, jcsj, dcwfqzhm_mg, dcwfqzhm_oz, dcwfqzhm_jnd, dcwfqzhm_qt, cfnr, qzhm, dw, zw, zc, cfsj_cj, cfsj_rj, ghsj, qzsj, cfmd, cfrw, jfly, bz, valid, create_time
from T_HZ
order by ${orderByClause}
